member.name: P:TehPers.FishingFramework.Api.Config.ITreasureConfiguration.TreasureChances
member.summary: Gets the chances for treasure to appear while fishing, and the chances for additional loot to appear in a treasure chest. These chances are checked every time an additional item of loot is added to the chest.

member.name: T:TehPers.FishingFramework.Api.IFishingApi
member.summary: The fishing API which allows mods to view and modify fishing properties. This API only affects the local player. If you would like your mod to affect other players, please use the SMAPI multiplayer API and rely on other players having your mod installed.

member.summary: An entity that is available sometimes while fishing.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingFramework.Api.IFishingAvailability.GetWeightedChance(StardewValley.Farmer,StardewValley.GameLocation,TehPers.Core.Api.Chrono.Weathers,TehPers.FishingFramework.Api.WaterTypes,TehPers.Core.Api.Chrono.SDateTime,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary:
Gets the weighted chance that this item can be caught under certain circumstances.
Keep in mind that some items may have no chance of appearing under those circumstances, so be sure to take that into account. The recommended way of checking if an item is available at all is to check if its weighted chance is greater than 1e-5d.
member.param: The that is fishing.
The being fished in.
The current weather.
The type of water being fished in.
The current .
The current mine level, or if not in the mines.
member.returns: The weighted chance that this item would be caught in the given circumstances.

member.name: T:TehPers.FishingFramework.Api.IFishingChances
member.summary:
The chances of something occurring while fishing.
Final chances are calculated as (baseChance + dailyLuck * dailyLuckFactor + luckLevel * luckLevelFactor + streak * streakFactor) * locationFactor bounded in the range [minChance, maxChance], then bounded once again in the range [0, 1].

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingFramework.Api.IFishingChances.BaseChance
member.summary: Gets the base chance.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingFramework.Api.IFishingChances.StreakFactor
member.summary: Gets the effect the perfect fishing streak has.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingFramework.Api.IFishingChances.FishingLevelFactor
member.summary: Gets the effect that fishing level has on this chance.

member.summary: Gets the effect that daily luck has.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingFramework.Api.IFishingChances.LuckLevelFactor
member.summary: Gets the effect that luck level has.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingFramework.Api.IFishingChances.LocationFactors
member.summary: Gets a mapping of locations to the effect those locations have on this chance.

member.summary: Gets the minimum possible chance.

member.summary: Gets the maximum possible chance.
